Description: Green jasper amulet: in the form of a turtle, with a loop for suspension at rear and tubular projection at side.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.58.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1994 / Amulets of Ancient Egypt (p.10 + fig. 67)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alan Henderson Gardiner
